text: Dust mite allergy is an allergy that is caused by the droppings of dust mites. It is common, and can cause asthma, eczema, or itching (though it may cause other things). ==Symptoms== Symptoms are: *Sneezing *A runny nose *Itchy, red, or watery eyes *A blocked nose *An itchy nose, mouth, or throat *Itchy skin *Mucus dripping from your nose into your throat *Cough ==References== Category:Allergies
title: Dust mite allergy
